com.qualitestgroup.util.reporting

Class EventCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualitestgroup.util.reporting.EventCase

  • public class EventCase
extends java.lang.Object
    Transfers data from data sheet to HTML table and logs success/failure, color codes them, and returns test case comments
    Author:
    Neo

        public java.lang.String error(java.lang.String message,
                              java.lang.String exception)
        This will create a new time stamped filename for each exception thrown. Each exception file will be closed off when the logging is finished. These individual files can be linked into the test log.
        Parameters:
        message -
        exception -
        Returns:
